tool_description: Check out this instead: https://rapidapi.com/imdb/api/movie-database-imdb-alternative. This api use for get imdb movie data.
name: Imdb
title: Imdb

api_list.name: /imdb
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bvr-imdb-v1-1.p.rapidapi.com/imdb"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bvr-imdb-v1-1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bvr-imdb-v1-1.p.rapidapi.com/imdb"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bvr-imdb-v1-1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
